What are the recommended specs for CSGO?
OS: Windows® 7/Vista/XP.
Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better.
Memory: 2 GB RAM.
Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0.
DirectX: Version 9.0c.
Storage: 15 GB available space.

Imagine the most toxic relationship that you cannot leave, because you love the toxicity so much. This game, is just that.

I am so done with this game. TLDR - One of the best multiplayer FPS games ever made. Horrible support by Value to manage hackers.

Been playing this for years. Have over 1k hours on 2 accounts. One of the most solid, well designed FPS games you can play. Excellent map design (thanks to the community), incredibly high skill ceiling, great workshop maps for training and dicking around, and just solid fundamentals. 

Hackers have always been an issue, but over the years it has gotten so much worse. It is so rare now to play a round where you don't believe at least one person has walls or an aimbot. Then you'll run into 13 yo teammates straight up telling you enemy locations because they have walls. It is so blatant now, it's mindblowing. Value will do these big player bans where they block a few thousand accounts, but then they go make the game FTP so there is nothing stopping someone from just creating a new account. 

For some reason I always came back. It's just such a pure FPS experience I've always been able to force myself to play in spite of the hacking problem. Today was the last straw. I got banned 35 min into a match because VAC said it detected something on my drive. A new PC that was just rebuilt 4 weeks ago with a fresh copy of Win 10, and VAC boots me from a match. Valve has no idea how to, or at least doesn't care to, manage a multiplayer experience while effectively blocking hackers. 

I'm going to be 50 one day and still remember my years playing this game. It was that big of a part of my gaming years. But I'm done now. Uninstalling this game. Peace.
